title: Dad Finds Box of Pawdorable Kittens Outside His House with a Message Written on It, He Finds the Furry Felines a Furrever Family, at His Own Home
author: Bar Mor Hazut
excerpt: Dad Finds Box of Pawdorable Kittens Outside His House with a Message Written on It, He Finds the Furry Felines a Furrever Family, at His Own Home - World's largest collection of cat memes and other animals
text: As feline fanatics, we are all extremely familiar with the running joke of the dad who doesn't want to adopt a cat, until one day a feisty feline finds its way to dad's home, and from there straight to his heart. We've seen countless memes and videos of dads like these, who are convinced they will never fall in love with a furry friend, until they inevitably do. Sometimes, the dad is actually the one to bring in the furry friends home, just like in the sweet story here. Dad found a box outside his home with four kittens inside, and a message telling people about their story. Dad's heart immediately went out to those sweet babies out in the cold, and he took them in without a second thought.The DodoHis own kids were happy about the four new additions to the family, and they all worked together to ensure those purrfect pals felt right at home.Keep scrolling to watch the full heartwarming story of this furrtastic family. After that, check out this cheerful celebration in the form of festive cat memes. Scroll down for the next article
html:
As feline fanatics, we are all extremely familiar with the running joke of the dad who doesn't want to adopt a cat, until one day a feisty feline finds its way to dad's home, and from there straight to his heart. We've seen countless memes and videos of dads like these, who are convinced they will never fall in love with a furry friend, until they inevitably do. 

Sometimes, the dad is actually the one to bring in the furry friends home, just like in the sweet story here. Dad found a box outside his home with four kittens inside, and a message telling people about their story. Dad's heart immediately went out to those sweet babies out in the cold, and he took them in without a second thought.

The Dodo

His own kids were happy about the four new additions to the family, and they all worked together to ensure those purrfect pals felt right at home.

Keep scrolling to watch the full heartwarming story of this furrtastic family. After that, check out this cheerful celebration in the form of festive cat memes.
